blogPost.excerpt: RecipeCart is a free extension that immediately shows you the recipe in a ready-for-print format. Print, save, or send the recipe to your phone. Under the hood, we use ML to identify exact ingredients + amounts for export to Instacart or Amazon Fresh.
blogPost.body: RecipeCart is a free extension that immediately shows you the recipe in a ready-for-print format. Print, save, or send the recipe to your phone. Under the hood, we use ML to identify exact ingredients + amounts for export to Instacart or Amazon Fresh.
blogPost.title: Recipe Cart Chrome Extension - Instantly see recipe or order ingredients on any recipe site
blogPost.author: Parker

localize.description: RecipeCart是一个免费的扩展，它可以立即以可供打印的格式向您显示食谱。打印、保存或将食谱发送到您的手机。在幕后，我们使用ML来确定出口到Insta或Amazon Fresh的确切配料+数量。
localize.tagline: 在任何食谱网站上即时查看食谱或订购食材

localize.description: RecipeCart是一個免費的擴展，它可以立即以可供打印的格式向您顯示食譜。打印、保存或將食譜發送到您的手機。在幕後，我們使用ML來確定出口到Insta或Amazon Fresh的確切配料+數量。
localize.tagline: 在任何食譜網站上即時查看食譜或訂購食材

previous.excerpt: Boost your influence by understanding your followers, automating your engagement, and categorizing your audience. Deliver them highly personalized and targeted content with our award-winning interactive content templates.
previous.title: Microinfluence - Take your influencer engagement to the next level

localize.description: 通过了解您的追随者、自动化您的参与以及对您的受众进行分类来提升您的影响力。通过我们屡获殊荣的交互式内容模板，为他们提供高度个性化和针对性的内容。
localize.tagline: 让您的影响者参与度更上一层楼

localize.description: 通過了解您的追隨者、自動化您的參與以及對您的受衆進行分類來提升您的影響力。通過我們屢獲殊榮的交互式內容模板，爲他們提供高度個性化和針對性的內容。
localize.tagline: 讓您的影響者參與度更上一層樓

next.excerpt: Project Lightspeed is a self contained live streaming server. With Lightspeed you will be able to deploy your own sub-second latency streaming site. The Lightspeed repository contains the instructions for installing and deploying the entire application.
next.title: Project Lightspeed - a sub-second, open source, self hosted stream from OBS

localize.description: Project LightSpeed是一个独立的直播服务器。使用LightSpeed，您将能够部署自己的亚秒级延迟流媒体站点。LightSpeed存储库包含安装和部署整个应用程序的说明。
localize.tagline: 来自OBS的次秒级开源自托管流

localize.description: Project LightSpeed是一個獨立的直播服務器。使用LightSpeed，您將能夠部署自己的亞秒級延遲流媒體站點。LightSpeed存儲庫包含安裝和部署整個應用程序的說明。
localize.tagline: 來自OBS的次秒級開源自託管流
